clause.title: Provision of guardrails: fixed back seats

subclause.title: SubClause
subclause.p: If seats with fixed backs are provided, guardrails that extend for the full width of the seating, must be provided at least 500 mm above the platform unlessâ€”

ol.li: fixed back seats of the next lower level project at least 500 mm above the level of the stepped platform; and
there is only one riser between the platform and next lower cross-over.
